name: Dronos - the great escape
description:
Use the asteroids as a cover while you make the great escape from a deadly enemy.
Upgrade you ship only to return stronger and faster to eventually destroy the enemy vessel and achieve a great and glorious victory!

Controls:
W,S - increase, decrease thrust.
A,D - turn left and right
Space - turbo boost
Mouse - aim
Left mouse button -  fire laser
